name: Pollinator (johnbrynte)
description:
The world is in crisis. Bees are nowhere to be seen. Fortunately, Polly owns a farm where they seem to feel at home. She must hurry to pollinate her berry plants before the bees fly away.

The plants gets their berries from cross pollination, so pay attention to the species 🌷🌼.

Controls [Arrow keys] / [WASD]Walk[Tab]Open bag / Put item in bag[Space]Grab item (hold) / Drop item / Select item
